name: Nitroverse
description:
Explore the endless expanses of Nitroverse, collecting precious resources and trading them for valuable items to arm yourself against a variety of enemies, it's up to you how far you get.

Features

  • Collect raw materials and create different items with them or combine these items
  • Fights against a number of different opponents
  • Achieve levels and permanent progress by completing a run
  • Procedurally generated worlds, endless mode, combinable weapons

Bosse und Gegner

There are quite a few different enemies and bosses, but be careful and explore the sectors with extreme caution, because the situation can escalate quickly!
